ORDER
Heard learned counsel for the petitioner.

2. The court below is directed to dispose of the
application seeking bail, if any filed by the petitioner, on his
surrender before the court below within 10 days from today,
preferably on the date of filing itself.

Crl.M.C. is disposed of as above.

Sd/-
(B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE)
